    <title>TechLearn Academy - Professional Training</title>
    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        body {
            font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;

        }

        .container {
            display: flex;
            min-height: 100vh;
        }

        /* Side Navigation */
        .sidebar {
            width: 280px;

            z-index: 1000;
        }

        .profile-section {

            padding: 30px 20px;
            text-align: center;
            color: white;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .profile-section::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            background: url('data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 100 100"><circle cx="50" cy="50" r="40" fill="none" stroke="rgba(255,255,255,0.1)" stroke-width="1"/></svg>');
            opacity: 0.3;
        }

        .profile-img {
            width: 80px;
            height: 80px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
            margin: 0 auto 15px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 2em;
            border: 3px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
        }

        .profile-name {
            font-size: 1.3em;
            font-weight: bold;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
        }

        .profile-role {
            font-size: 0.9em;

        }

        .nav-menu {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 20px 0;
        }

        .nav-item {
            display: block;
            padding: 15px 25px;
            color: #ccc;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            border-left: 4px solid transparent;
            font-weight: 500;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 15px;
        }

        .nav-item:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 159, 28, 0.1);
            color: #ff9f1c;
            border-left-color: #ff9f1c;
            transform: translateX(5px);
        }

        .nav-item.active {
            background: rgba(255, 159, 28, 0.15);
            color: #ff9f1c;
            border-left-color: #ff9f1c;
        }

        .nav-icon {
            width: 20px;

            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

            margin-bottom: 40px;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .hero-section::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -50%;
            right: -50%;
            width: 200%;
            height: 200%;
            background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 0%, transparent 70%);
            animation: rotate 20s linear infinite;
        }

        @keyframes rotate {
            0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
            100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
        }

        .hero-content {

            z-index: 1;

        }

        .cta-button:hover {
            background: #ffbf69;
            transform: translateY(-2px);

        }

        /* Content Sections */
        .content-section {

            transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
        }

        .content-section:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);

        }

        .section-title {
            font-size: 2.2em;

            color: #333;
            position: relative;
        }

        .section-title::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            bottom: -10px;
            left: 0;
            width: 60px;
            height: 4px;
            background: #ff9f1c;
            border-radius: 2px;
        }

        .courses-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: 25px;
            margin-top: 30px;
        }

        .course-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8f9ff 0%, #e8f2ff 100%);

            border-radius: 15px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;

        .course-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 15px 30px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.2);
        }

        .course-title {

            font-weight: bold;
            color: #667eea;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }

        .course-description {
            color: #666;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .course-duration {
            display: inline-block;
            background: #ff9f1c;
            color: white;
            padding: 5px 15px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        .stats-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
            gap: 20px;
            margin-top: 30px;
        }

        .stat-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1a1a1a 0%, #2d2d2d 100%);
            color: white;
            padding: 30px 20px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .stat-number {
            font-size: 2.5em;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #ff9f1c;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }

        .stat-label {
            font-size: 1.1em;
            opacity: 0.9;
        }

        /* Responsive Design */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .sidebar {
                transform: translateX(-100%);
                transition: transform 0.3s ease;
            }

            .sidebar.open {
                transform: translateX(0);
            }

            .main-content {
                margin-left: 0;
                padding: 20px;
            }

            .hero-title {
                font-size: 2em;
            }

            .courses-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
        }

        .menu-toggle {
            display: none;
            position: fixed;
            top: 20px;
            left: 20px;
            z-index: 1001;
            background: #ff9f1c;
            color: white;
            border: none;
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 1.2em;
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .menu-toggle {
                display: block;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>

    <script>
        function showSection(sectionName) {
            // Hide all sections
            const sections = document.querySelectorAll('.section');
            sections.forEach(section => {
                section.style.display = 'none';
            });

            // Show selected section
            document.getElementById(sectionName + '-section').style.display = 'block';

            // Update active nav item
            const navItems = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-item');
            navItems.forEach(item => {
                item.classList.remove('active');
            });
            
            event.target.closest('.nav-item').classList.add('active');

            // Close mobile menu
            if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
                document.getElementById('sidebar').classList.remove('open');
            }
        }

        function toggleMenu() {
            const sidebar = document.getElementById('sidebar');
            sidebar.classList.toggle('open');
        }

        // Close mobile menu when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
            const sidebar = document.getElementById('sidebar');
            const menuToggle = document.querySelector('.menu-toggle');
            
            if (window.innerWidth <= 768 && 
                !sidebar.contains(event.target) && 
                !menuToggle.contains(event.target)) {
                sidebar.classList.remove('open');
            }
        });

        // Initialize default section
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            showSection('home');
        });
    </script>
